com.joliciel.talismane.parser.output

Class FreemarkerParseWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.output.FreemarkerParseWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParseConfigurationProcessor, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandoffSentenceWriter

    public class FreemarkerParseWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParseConfigurationProcessor
    Processes parser output by writing via a freemarker template. Will either use the built-in template specified in talismane.core.[sessionId].parser.output.built-in-template, or any other template specified in talismane.core.[sessionId].parser.output.template.
    If no writer is specified, will write to a file with the suffix "_dep.txt".
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
